remarks: Properties that determine an Abelian group operation.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isgrpda.1 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
isgrpda.2 $e |- ( ph -> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) $.
isgrpda.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) ) -> ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) $.
isgrpda.4 $e |- ( ph -> U e. X ) $.
isgrpda.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( U G x ) = x ) $.
isablda.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> E. n e. X ( n G x ) = U ) $.
isablda.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) $.
isabloda $p |- ( ph -> G e. AbelOp ) $.
$d G n x y z $.
$d U n x y z $.
$d X n x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
